## sampleBy() function

从集合中随机获得一个元素的迭代值。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sampleBy<T, X>(collection: T[], iteratee: (element: T, index: number) => X): X | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collection | T\[\] | 集合 |
|  iteratee | (element: T, index: number) =&gt; X | 迭代函数 |

<b>Returns:</b>

X \| undefined
